languages.text: "Ее смущают... перспективы нашего сотрудничества. Старая разбойница предпочитает ввязываться в схватки, исход которых предрешен в ее пользу. И сейчас она, кажется, планирует скорее удрать, чем драться. Ей нужна правильная мотивация... Какая жалость, что у суки нет ни одного человека, которым бы она дорожила и которого я мог бы взять в заложники".

"She has misgivings about... the prospect of our cooperation. The old rogue prefers not to pick fights unless her victory is a foregone conclusion. And right now she seems to be planning on fleeing rather than fighting. She needs the right kind of motivation... It's a shame there's no one the cold bitch values enough for me to take hostage."
languages.original_text: "Ее смущают... перспективы нашего сотрудничества. Старая разбойница предпочитает ввязываться в схватки, исход которых предрешен в ее пользу. И сейчас она, кажется, планирует скорее удрать, чем драться. Ей нужна правильная мотивация... Какая жалость, что у суки нет ни одного человека, которым бы она дорожила и которого я мог бы взять в заложники".

traits.locale_text: "She has misgivings about... the prospect of our cooperation. The old rogue prefers not to pick fights unless her victory is a foregone conclusion. And right now she seems to be planning on fleeing rather than fighting. She needs the right kind of motivation... What a shame there's no one the cold bitch values enough for me to take them hostage."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “她对……我们的合作前景心存疑虑。那个老流氓从来不主动出手，除非她确信一定能获得胜利。而现在，她好像不打算参战，打算一走了之。她需要某种动机才会加入这场战斗……但遗憾的是，那个冷血的婊子好像根本不在乎任何人，我们没办法把谁扣下来当人质。”
languages.original_text: "She has misgivings about... the prospect of our cooperation. The old rogue prefers not to pick fights unless her victory is a foregone conclusion. And right now she seems to be planning on fleeing rather than fighting. She needs the right kind of motivation... It's a shame there's no one the cold bitch values enough for me to take hostage."

traits.locale_text: “她对……我们的合作前景心存疑虑。那个老流氓从来不主动出手，除非她确信一定能获得胜利。而现在，她好像不打算战斗，打算一走了之。她需要某种动机才会加入这场战斗……但遗憾的是，那个冷血的婊子好像根本不在乎任何人，我们没办法把谁扣下来当人质。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「彼女は私達の組織の将来性に…不安を抱いている。あのババアは、勝利が確定している戦にしか参加しない。そして今は、戦うのではなく逃げるための計画をしているようだ。彼女をやる気にさせる何かが必要なんだが…残念なことに、あのクソババアが愛情を注いでいる相手はいない。誰を人質に取っても無駄だ」
languages.original_text: "She has misgivings about... the prospect of our cooperation. The old rogue prefers not to pick fights unless her victory is a foregone conclusion. And right now she seems to be planning on fleeing rather than fighting. She needs the right kind of motivation... It's a shame there's no one the cold bitch values enough for me to take hostage."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は私達の組織の将来性に…不安を抱いている。あのババアは、勝利が確定している戦にしか参加しない。そして今は、戦うのではなく逃げるための計画をしているようだ。彼女をやる気にさせる何かが必要なんだが…残念なことに、あのクソババアが愛情を注いでいる相手はいない。誰を人質に取っても無駄だ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Tiene dudas sobre... la perspectiva de nuestra cooperación. Esa canalla prefiere no buscar pelea a menos que sepa que va a salir victoriosa. Y en estos momentos parece estar planeando su huida. Necesita la motivación adecuada... Qué pena, no hay nadie a quien esa zorra valore lo suficiente como para tomarlo como rehén».
languages.original_text: "She has misgivings about... the prospect of our cooperation. The old rogue prefers not to pick fights unless her victory is a foregone conclusion. And right now she seems to be planning on fleeing rather than fighting. She needs the right kind of motivation... It's a shame there's no one the cold bitch values enough for me to take hostage."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene dudas sobre... la perspectiva de nuestra cooperación. Esa canalla prefiere no buscar pelea a menos que sepa que va a salir victoriosa. Y en estos momentos parece estar planeando su huida. Necesita la motivación adecuada... Qué pena, no hay nadie a quien esa zorra valore lo suficiente como para tomarlo como rehén».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Sie hat Bedenken hinsichtlich ... unserer Kooperation. Die alte Piratin bricht nur dann einen Kampf vom Zaun, wenn ihr Sieg von vornherein feststeht. Und im Augenblick hat sie offenbar eher vor zu fliehen, als zu kämpfen. Sie braucht die richtige Motivation ... Ein Jammer, der kaltherzigen Schlampe ist niemand wichtig genug, dass ich jemanden als Geisel nehmen könnte."
languages.original_text: "She has misgivings about... the prospect of our cooperation. The old rogue prefers not to pick fights unless her victory is a foregone conclusion. And right now she seems to be planning on fleeing rather than fighting. She needs the right kind of motivation... It's a shame there's no one the cold bitch values enough for me to take hostage."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hat Bedenken hinsichtlich ... unserer Kooperation. Die alte Piratin bricht nur dann einen Kampf vom Zaun, wenn ihr Sieg von vornherein feststeht. Und im Augenblick hat sie offenbar eher vor zu fliehen, als zu kämpfen. Sie braucht die richtige Motivation ... Ein Jammer, der kaltherzigen Schlampe ist niemand wichtig genug, dass ich jemanden als Geisel nehmen könnte."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Elle a des doutes quant à... la possibilité d'une coopération entre nous. Cette vieille pirate préfère éviter la bagarre tant qu'elle n'est pas sûre de remporter la victoire, et actuellement, elle semble pencher davantage pour la fuite que pour le combat. Il lui faut une bonne motivation... Dommage que cette charogne n'ait personne qui lui soit assez cher pour faire un otage convaincant. »
languages.original_text: "She has misgivings about... the prospect of our cooperation. The old rogue prefers not to pick fights unless her victory is a foregone conclusion. And right now she seems to be planning on fleeing rather than fighting. She needs the right kind of motivation... It's a shame there's no one the cold bitch values enough for me to take hostage."

traits.locale_text: « Elle a des doutes quant à... la possibilité d'une coopération entre nous. Cette vieille pirate préfère éviter la bagarre tant qu'elle n'est pas sûre de remporter la victoire, et actuellement, elle semble pencher davantage pour la fuite que pour le combat. Il lui faut une bonne motivation... Dommage que cette charogne n'ait personne qui lui soit assez cher pour faire un otage convaincant. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "İşbirliğimizin ayrıntılarına dair... Bazı şüpheleri var. İhtiyar, zaferi meçhul olan çarpışmalara girişmemeyi tercih ediyor. Şimdi de savaşmaktansa kaçmayı planlıyor gibi. Bir şekilde ikna edilmesi lazım... Issız kahpenin yeterince değer verdiği birileri yok ki rehine alayım."
languages.original_text: "She has misgivings about... the prospect of our cooperation. The old rogue prefers not to pick fights unless her victory is a foregone conclusion. And right now she seems to be planning on fleeing rather than fighting. She needs the right kind of motivation... It's a shame there's no one the cold bitch values enough for me to take hostage."

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
